QuestData.Title: WANTED: Quartermaster Ssylis
QuestData.Description:
Some pirates took off with a supply crate that landed further away from this site then intended.
I don't think there was anything valuable in there, but now the pirates know we're here.
The leader was one of those big lizard men. The worker that kills him will get double pay for the week!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The saurok in charge. Not a small threat by any sense of the word.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Quartermaster Ssylis in Krakenbane Cove.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Qiz Slickcopper at the Waning Glacier.
